ComicInfo.Title: Pirate Peril!; Two Weeks with Pay; The Four-Fingered Hand!; Master of His Fate!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Pirate Peril!: On vacation in a seaside New England town, Tom Cargill meets Dr. Oswald, a psychic researcher who summons the ghosts of a pirate crew that wreaks havoc until they are stopped by Magicman.
Two Weeks with Pay: Hobbs always makes up wild stories about his vacation exploits that no one believes. This year, he is captured by aliens, and when he returns to work, doesn't say a word about it.
The Four-Fingered Hand!: A strange talisman is found on dead evildoers throughout history.
Master of His Fate!: Cyrus Robroy insists to everyone that he controls his own destiny, but the gods, amused by his arrogance, have other ideas.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Richard E. Hughes,Ace Aquila,Zev Zimmer,Richard E. Hughes,Ace Aquila
ComicInfo.Penciller: Pete Costanza,Emil Gershwin,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe,Pete Costanza,Emil Gershwin,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe
ComicInfo.Inker: Pete Costanza,Emil Gershwin,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe,Pete Costanza,Emil Gershwin,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe
